Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 58 of 262 1763
LC8VMAX2 Shawn - cross
1 A. Very rarely.
2 Q. When you do speak, what do you speak about?
3 A. My son.
4 Q. Do you two share a child?
5 A. We do.
6 Q. Since you broke up with Carolyn, have you had any conversations with her about what happened with Jeffrey Epstein?
7
8 Epstein?
9 A. No, ma'am.
10 Q. Have you had any conversations with Carolyn about your testimony here today?
11
12 A. No, ma'am.
13 MS. COMEY: No further questions, your Honor.
14 THE COURT: All right. Mr. Pagliuca.
15 MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, your Honor. Briefly.
16 CROSS-EXAMINATION
17 BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
18 Q. Shawn, you recall going --
19 THE COURT: Take off your mask.
20 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor.
21 THE COURT: Thank you.
22 Q. Shawn, you recall going to the house in Palm Beach in 2002; correct?
23
24 A. Yes.
25 Q. And you testified that you and Carolyn shared a phone; is
